commands.name: dev audit messages
commands.description: Audit messages in a plugin's messages directory to locate unused messages and missing messages that have references in source code.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --project-dir
optionalFlags.description: Location of the project where messages are to be audited.

optionalFlags.name: --messages-dir
optionalFlags.description: Directory that contains the plugin's message files. The default is the "messages" directory in the current working directory.

optionalFlags.name: --source-dir
optionalFlags.description: Directory that contains the plugin's source code. The default is the "src" directory in the current working directory.

commands.name: dev convert messages
commands.description: Convert a .json messages file into Markdown.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --project-dir
optionalFlags.description: Location of the project whose messages are to be converted.

commands.name: dev convert script
commands.description: Convert a script file that contains deprecated sfdx-style commands to use the new sf-style commands instead.

requiredFlags.name: --script
requiredFlags.description: Filepath to the script you want to convert.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

requiredFlags.name: --name
requiredFlags.description: Name of the new command. Use colons to separate the topic and command names.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --dry-run
optionalFlags.description: Display the changes that would be made without writing them to disk.

optionalFlags.name: --nuts
optionalFlags.description: Generate a NUT test file for the command.

optionalFlags.name: --unit
optionalFlags.description: Generate a unit test file for the command.

commands.name: dev generate flag
commands.description: Generate a flag for an existing command.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --dry-run
optionalFlags.description: Print new flag code instead of adding it to the command file.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --dry-run
optionalFlags.description: Display the changes that would be made without writing them to disk.
